longDesc: A mountain goat nibbles at a piece of grass here.
detailedDesc: This goat is acclimated to the rugged terrain of the  This goat is acclimated to the rugged terrain of the  mountains.  It looks at you and shies away a little.

longDesc: A cloaked and clawed demon of decay comes at you viciously!
detailedDesc: This demon has pure malevolence for anything living.   This demon has pure malevolence for anything living.   Oops!  You're living!  I guess that means you!

longDesc: A mound of books rise up into a human shape and tries to hit you!
detailedDesc: Ironically enough, the book-monster's head is War and Ironically enough, the book-monster's head is War and Peace.  Hmm.

longDesc: A bad feeling chokes your throat.
detailedDesc: It resembles a lot of other bad feelings you've had, It resembles a lot of other bad feelings you've had, but a lot more tangible... magic?

longDesc: Your worst nightmare coalesces in front of you and attacks!
detailedDesc: It looks like you deepest, darkest fears personified. It looks like you deepest, darkest fears personified. Wait a minute!  It IS your deepest, darkest fears personified!

longDesc: A guardian guards the door.  It looks at you and attacks!
detailedDesc: The guardian guards the door.  That's about all its The guardian guards the door.  That's about all its brain can handle: guarding.
